Lift the Shadow Curse

Lift the Shadow Curse is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Lift the Shadow Curse can be acquired during Act 2 and is related to Halsin. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Help Halsin remove the shadow curse surrounding Moon
